name: The Tower of Heroes
description:
A surreal text adventure game about climbing the legendary "Tower of Heroes", a tower holding unimaginable riches for those who make it to the top. You venture from your home and attempt the challenge. You have plenty of choices to make if you hope to succeed in climbing the tower. But, be careful. Make the wrong choice and you may not make it back home. Do you have what it takes to make it to the top?

This game was made in about 5-6 days for "HawkSandwich's Surreal Jam" : https://itch.io/jam/hawksandwich-surreal-jam. The story is rushed and preachy but, overall, I'm happy with the result.

I hope you enjoy!
